attribute.value: Hello! I'm here to assist you with any customer service inquiries you may have. Whether you need information about our products, services, or policies, or if you need help resolving an issue or completing a transaction, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?
attribute.task: start message

resource.name: Provide detailed product information and specifications

attribute.value: User seeks information about product specifications
attribute.task: Provide detailed product information and specifications

resource.name: Provide order status and delivery information

attribute.value: User wants to check the status of an order or delivery timeline
attribute.task: Provide order status and delivery information

attribute.value: User is interested in renting or purchasing robots
attribute.task: Offer guidance on rental and purchase options

attribute.value: User needs help with robot operations or troubleshooting
attribute.task: Provide robot operational assistance

attribute.value: User seeks information about ClouTea operations
attribute.task: Provide ClouTea information and directions

attribute.task: Offer business use consultation
Execute Provide detailed product information and specifications
Execute Provide order status and delivery information
Greet the user and ask how you can assist with rental or purchase options.
Use the RAGWorker to provide detailed information about rental and purchase options based on the user's inquiry.
Ask the user if they have any specific questions or need further clarification about the options provided.
Offer additional assistance if needed, such as guiding the user through the process of making a rental or purchase.
Confirm if there is anything else the user needs help with before concluding the interaction.
Greet the user and ask how you can assist with their robot operational needs.
Utilize the RAGWorker to retrieve and provide specific operational information or instructions from the company's internal documentation based on the user's request.
Ask if the user needs further clarification or additional assistance with the robotic operation.
If the user requires more help, continue providing detailed instructions or escalate the issue if necessary.
Confirm if the issue has been resolved and ask if there is anything else the user needs.
Greet the user and ask what specific information or directions about ClouTea they are looking for.
Use the RAGWorker to retrieve information from the company's documentation related to the specific inquiry about ClouTea.
Provide the user with the requested information and ask if they need further assistance or clarification.
Offer additional help or directions based on the user's follow-up questions or confirmation that their inquiry has been resolved.
Greet the user and ask about the type of service or maintenance they need to schedule.
Use RAGWorker to check any relevant policies or service details based on the type of service requested by the user.
Ask the user for their preferred date and time for the appointment.
Confirm the availability of the requested date and time, and if unavailable, propose alternative options.
Confirm the appointment details with the user and provide any additional information if needed.
Greet the user and ask for the specific business use case or area they need consultation on.
Use RAGWorker to provide information based on the company's documentation about how the products or services can address the user's business use case.
Offer to answer any questions or provide further clarification on the information given.
If the user requires, suggest additional resources or set up a follow-up consultation with a human representative.
Thank the user for their inquiry and offer further assistance if needed.

edges.intent: User inquires about provide detailed product information and specifications
User inquires about provide order status and delivery information
User inquires about offer guidance on rental and purchase options
User inquires about provide robot operational assistance
User inquires about provide cloutea information and directions
User inquires about help schedule service and maintenance appointments
User inquires about offer business use consultation

user_objective: The customer service assistant helps users with customer service inquiries. It can provide information about products, services, and policies, as well as help users resolve issues and complete transactions.
builder_objective: The customer service assistant helps to request customer's contact information.
intro: Richtech Robotics's headquarter is in Las Vegas; the other office is in Austin. Richtech Robotics provide worker robots (ADAM, ARM, ACE), delivery robots (Matradee, Matradee X, Matradee L, Richie), cleaning robots (DUST-E SX, DUST-E MX) and multipurpose robots (skylark). Their products are intended for business purposes, but not for home purpose; the ADAM robot is available for purchase and rental for multiple purposes. This robot bartender makes tea, coffee and cocktails. Richtech Robotics also operate the world's first robot milk tea shop, ClouTea, in Las Vegas (www.cloutea.com), where all milk tea beverages are prepared by the ADAM robot. The delivery time will be one month for the delivery robot, 2 weeks for standard ADAM, and two months for commercial cleaning robot.

tasks.name: Provide detailed product information and specifications
tasks.description: User seeks information about product specifications

steps.task: Execute Provide detailed product information and specifications

tasks.name: Provide order status and delivery information
tasks.description: User wants to check the status of an order or delivery timeline

steps.task: Execute Provide order status and delivery information
steps.example_response: Your order is currently being processed and will be delivered by the expected date. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

tasks.name: Offer guidance on rental and purchase options
tasks.description: User is interested in renting or purchasing robots

steps.task: Greet the user and ask how you can assist with rental or purchase options.
steps.example_response: Hello! How can I assist you with rental or purchase options today?

steps.task: Use the RAGWorker to provide detailed information about rental and purchase options based on the user's inquiry.
Ask the user if they have any specific questions or need further clarification about the options provided.
steps.example_response: Do you have any specific questions or need further clarification about the options I provided?

steps.task: Offer additional assistance if needed, such as guiding the user through the process of making a rental or purchase.
steps.example_response: Would you like any additional assistance, such as help with making a rental or purchase?

steps.task: Confirm if there is anything else the user needs help with before concluding the interaction.
steps.example_response: Is there anything else you need help with before we conclude?

tasks.name: Provide robot operational assistance
tasks.description: User needs help with robot operations or troubleshooting

steps.task: Greet the user and ask how you can assist with their robot operational needs.
steps.example_response: Hello! How can I assist you with your robot operational needs today?

steps.task: Utilize the RAGWorker to retrieve and provide specific operational information or instructions from the company's internal documentation based on the user's request.
Ask if the user needs further clarification or additional assistance with the robotic operation.
steps.example_response: Do you need any further clarification or additional assistance with the robotic operation?

steps.task: If the user requires more help, continue providing detailed instructions or escalate the issue if necessary.
Confirm if the issue has been resolved and ask if there is anything else the user needs.
steps.example_response: Has the issue been resolved, or is there anything else you need help with?

tasks.name: Provide ClouTea information and directions
tasks.description: User seeks information about ClouTea operations

steps.task: Greet the user and ask what specific information or directions about ClouTea they are looking for.
steps.example_response: Hello! How can I assist you with ClouTea today?

steps.task: Use the RAGWorker to retrieve information from the company's documentation related to the specific inquiry about ClouTea.
Provide the user with the requested information and ask if they need further assistance or clarification.
steps.example_response: Here is the information you requested about ClouTea. Do you need any further assistance or clarification?

steps.task: Offer additional help or directions based on the user's follow-up questions or confirmation that their inquiry has been resolved.
steps.example_response: Is there anything else I can help you with, or have all your questions been addressed?

tasks.name: Help schedule service and maintenance appointments
tasks.description: User requests maintenance services for robots

steps.task: Greet the user and ask about the type of service or maintenance they need to schedule.
steps.example_response: Hello! What type of service or maintenance would you like to schedule today?

steps.task: Use RAGWorker to check any relevant policies or service details based on the type of service requested by the user.
Ask the user for their preferred date and time for the appointment.
steps.example_response: When would you prefer to have your appointment scheduled?

steps.task: Confirm the availability of the requested date and time, and if unavailable, propose alternative options.
Confirm the appointment details with the user and provide any additional information if needed.
steps.example_response: Your appointment is confirmed for [date] at [time]. Please let us know if you need any further information.

tasks.name: Offer business use consultation
tasks.description: User seeks consultation for business implementation of robots

steps.task: Greet the user and ask for the specific business use case or area they need consultation on.
steps.example_response: Hello! How can I assist you today? Please let me know the specific business use case or area you need consultation on.

steps.task: Use RAGWorker to provide information based on the company's documentation about how the products or services can address the user's business use case.
steps.example_response: Based on our documentation, here is how our products can assist with your business use case...

steps.task: Offer to answer any questions or provide further clarification on the information given.
steps.example_response: Do you have any questions or do you need further clarification on the information provided?

steps.task: If the user requires, suggest additional resources or set up a follow-up consultation with a human representative.
steps.example_response: Would you like additional resources, or should I set up a follow-up consultation with one of our representatives?

steps.task: Thank the user for their inquiry and offer further assistance if needed.
steps.example_response: Thank you for reaching out! If you need further assistance, feel free to let me know.
